column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Absolutely amazing food and great coffee.  My least favorite thing about this place is that EVERYONE loves it.  Getting seated often takes forever
column2: but it's worth the wait and the service is always exceptional.  Before eating at Wildberry I actually thought I disliked pancakes
column3: but theirs are absolutely amazing.  Perfect texture.  Perfect taste.  You almost don't need syrup!
